posts.postText:
This topic is a place to post maps that you think would be a good addition to the Jailbreak server.  Posted maps will then be reviewed by staff, and if they are well accepted, will be uploaded onto the server.  Also, please test the maps yourself first before posting them.
Some restrictions

Map must support at least 28 players
Map size cannot exceed 30 megabytes uncompressed (after extracted)
